pujaka andum (nikma: 39:1-21) 1 ”mata pujaka nilayehi sewaya karana pinisa ishrayel janaya atharin numbae sahodaraya wana aaron da ohu samanga ohuge puthrayan wana nadab saha abihu da eleyasar saha eethamar da kandawanna. 2 numbae sahodaraya wana aaron sandaha garuthwaya ha alankaraya gena dena shuddha wasthra sadiya yuthu ya. 3 aaron mata pujaka sewaya karana pinisa ohu kapa kirimata awashya wasthra sadimata ma wisin wishesha hakiyawakin purna kota thibena, siyalu daksha shilpin hata numbaa ana kala yuthu ya. 4 owun sadiya yuthu wasthra nam: laya wasma, eepod nam sattaya, loguwa, mal wada damu kabaya, makutaya saha bandapatiya we.
